meanings.definition: Express warm approval or admiration for someone's achievements.
meanings.sent1: I congratulate my friend on winning the race.
meanings.sent2: It is polite to congratulate someone on their success.
meanings.sent3: Let's congratulate Sarah on her amazing painting skills!
meanings.sent4: Her hard work in the project deserves to be congratulated.
meanings.sent5: The whole town gathered to congratulate the hero for his bravery.

meanings.sent1: We should congratulate our team for their excellent performance.
meanings.sent2: The teacher will congratulate the students on their good grades.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't help but congratulate him on his impressive cooking skills.
meanings.sent4: The audience rose to congratulate the singer for her outstanding performance.
meanings.sent5: The coach will congratulate the players for their hard work and dedication.
